title: Hold up!!
creator_credit: Dave Gibson, Gibson Film Productions and Gaylene Preston
brief_description: The film presents a drama in which three disabled people are key witnesses to a robbery but have trouble breaking through the crowd to tell the police. Following the drama the three main actors, who are themselves disabled, share some of their real life experiences and explain how they deal with prejudice. Recommended for 8-14 year olds
